hey guys. i just joined but i have been collecting Japanese swords 
for some time now. well the other day at the flee market i found this 
GREAT KATANA. it only cost $500 and i could date it back to the 1844 
from the markings on it. i was woundering if anyone could help me 
price it. i'll have the pictures on the photos page under great 
finds. so if anyone has a number for me or could help me find one 
then i would like it very much.

peace,
 rich
